column1: #text=With a family of five it seemed like all we ever did was go to the supermarket .
#text=Walmart and I built a strong personal relationship .
#text=Not only did they have household items and clothes that I loved , they had food .
#text=Every week I spend an hour online printing and sorting my coupons .
#text=It is always to good to grab extra deals even if it is just cents off .
#text=After compiling my coupons I make my shopping list and break it down to aisles .
#text=It 's so amazing that I have been to Walmart so many times that I remember their aisles .
#text=When I arrive in the food section I start with the middle aisles first and then I work my way around , getting milk last .
#text=Sometimes I have to buy so many things that I leave with two or three carts .
#text=Grocery shopping is beyond a tedious task that I hate to love .
